content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 17 Nov 2018What do people mean when they say “en block”?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 17 Nov 2018In Singapore, en bloc sales refer to property sales. Specifically, when the residents of an older property development sell their homes all at the same time to a buyer (typically a property developer, but sometimes the government). https://blog.moneysmart.sg/property/en-bloc-singapore/0 comments0
